nodes.text: Veedrig was a Devaronian male under the employ of Toborro the Hutt during the time of the Conquest of Makeb. Commissioned to build The Ark, Veedrig, assisted by Batza, used the project as a means for profit, cutting corners and endangering his workers. Guarded by Hutt droids, workers like the project's foreman Tiero were not able to protest the conditions they were operating in. The arrival of a Republic strike force ended his leadership of the project, to be replaced by Tiero.
Veedrig is a NPC in the 2011 Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel MMO video game.
Veedrig's fate is decided two ways after the player(s) defeat him:
